00425 inline uint32
00426 SearchMap2::getIndex(const SearchMapItem* item) const
00427 {
00428    // Pointer arithmetics.
00429    return item - m_allItems;
00430 }

00443 
00444 inline bool
00445 SearchMap2::isInsideRegion(const SearchMapItem* item,
00446                            uint32 regionIndex) const
00447 {
00448    for ( SearchMapRegionIterator it = item->getRegionBegin(this);
00449          it != item->getRegionEnd(this);
00450          ++it ) {
00451       if ( *it == regionIndex ) {
00452          return true;
00453       } else if ( isInsideRegion(getItemByIndex(*it), regionIndex ) ) {
00454          return true;
00455       }
00456    }
00457    return false;
00458 }
00459 
00460 inline pair<const char*, LangTypes::language_t>
00461 SearchMap2::getBestName(const SearchMapItem* item,
00462                         LangTypes::language_t reqLang,
00463                         int oldNameNumber) const
00464 {
00465    if ( oldNameNumber < 0 ) {
00466       // Return the best name
00467       return m_stringTable->getBestNameInCombo(reqLang,
00468                                                item->m_strIdx);
00469    } else {
00470       // Check if the new name was a synonym name
00471       uint32 idx = m_stringTable->getBestIdxInCombo(reqLang,
00472                                                     item->m_strIdx);
00473       if ( GET_STRING_TYPE(idx) == ItemTypes::synonymName ) {
00474          mc2dbg8 << "[SM2]: Best name is "
00475                  << ItemTypes::getNameTypeAsString(GET_STRING_TYPE(idx))
00476                  << endl;
00477          // Return the old name, since changing the language
00478          // will only confuse
00479          return pair<const char*, LangTypes::language_t>
00480             (item->getName(this, oldNameNumber), LangTypes::invalidLanguage);
00481       } else {
00482          // Return the new name.
00483          return pair<const char*, LangTypes::language_t>
00484             (m_stringTable->getName(GET_STRING_INDEX(idx)),
00485              GET_STRING_LANGUAGE(idx));
00486       }
00487    }
00488 }
00489 
00490 inline const char*
00491 SearchMap2::getBestNameOfType( const SearchMapItem* item,
00492                                LangTypes::language_t reqLang,
00493                                ItemTypes::name_t type ) const
00494 {
00495    uint32 strIdx = m_stringTable->getBestIdxOfTypeInCombo( reqLang,
00496                                                            type,
00497                                                            item->m_strIdx );
00498    
00499    if ( strIdx != MAX_UINT32 ) {
00500       if ( type == ItemTypes::synonymName ) {
00501          // Shortest synonym name is best
00502          LangTypes::language_t allowedLang = GET_STRING_LANGUAGE( strIdx );
00503          const int nbrNames = item->getNbrNames( this );
00504          
00505          uint32 bestStrIdx = strIdx;
00506          int bestLength = strlen(
00507             m_stringTable->getName( GET_STRING_INDEX( strIdx )));
00508          for( int i = 0; i < nbrNames; ++i ) {
00509             uint32 curStrInfo = item->getNameInfo(this, i);
00510             if ( GET_STRING_INDEX(curStrInfo) == GET_STRING_INDEX( strIdx ) ) {
00511                continue;
00512             }
00513             if ( GET_STRING_LANGUAGE( curStrInfo ) == allowedLang &&
00514                  GET_STRING_TYPE ( curStrInfo ) == type ) {
00515                const char* curName =
00516                   m_stringTable->getName( GET_STRING_INDEX( curStrInfo ) );
00517                int curLength = strlen(curName);
00518                if ( curLength < bestLength ) {
00519                   bestLength = curLength;
00520                   bestStrIdx = curStrInfo;
00521                }
00522             }
00523          }
00524          strIdx = bestStrIdx;
00525       }
00526                                                
00527       return m_stringTable->getName( GET_STRING_INDEX( strIdx ) );
00528    } else {
00529       return NULL;
00530    }
00531 }

00534 inline pair<const char*, LangTypes::language_t>
00535 SearchMap2::getBestAddress(const SearchMapPOIInfo* poiInfo,
00536                            LangTypes::language_t reqLang) const
00537 {
00538    return m_stringTable->getBestNameInCombo(reqLang,
00539                                             poiInfo->m_addressIdx);
00540 }
